name: SugarBall
description:
To play the game click the link below!

SugarBall

(Will redirect to philome.la page)

Welcome to the dating sim called SugarBall! Our Lesbian protagonist, Darcy must find a date to the most fancy and exclusive dance ball of the season!

This is currently a WIP. This was a game that I made in my digital narratives class and decided that I would submit this to the Sugar,Sweets and Jam! gamejam. Enjoy!
